main event: A bright, circular object was spotted by the Z____ family in Ocala, Florida, on November 7, 1955.
interesting points: The object was traveling at a high rate of speed and emitting sparks or fire tails.
The object changed course suddenly from a northerly to a southwesterly direction.
The sighting lasted for approximately 15-20 minutes.
No aircraft were reported in the area at the time of the sighting.
The Ocala Air Force Base immediately notified the 20th Air Division, MacDill Air Force Base, Tampa, Florida, of the sighting.
